IS_EMAIL_EMPTY: The email field cannot be empty.
IS_PASSWORD_EMPTY: The password field cannot be empty.
IS_PASSWORD_STRING: The password field must be a string.
PASSWORD_POLICY_ENFORCEMENT: Password must be 8 characters long with at least one letter, one number, one special character and no spaces.
IS_USER_NAME_EMPTY: The user name field cannot be empty.
IS_USER_NAME_STRING: The user name field must be a string.
ARE_ROLE_IDS_IN_NUMBERS: Each value in roles must be a number adhering to the specified constraint.
ARE_PERMISSION_IDS_IN_NUMBERS: Each value in permissions must be a number adhering to the specified constraint.
IS_STORAGE_PREFERENCE_STRING: The storagePreference field must be a string.
IS_STORAGE_PREFERENCE_EMPTY: The storagePreference field cannot be empty.
IS_LANGUAGE_PREFERENCE_STRING: The languagePreference field must be a string.
IS_IS_ACTIVE_BOOLEAN: The isActive field must be a boolean value.
IS_PERMISSION_NAME_STRING: The permission name field must be a string.
IS_PERMISSION_NAME_EMPTY: The permission name field cannot be empty.
IS_ROLE_NAME_EMPTY: The role name field cannot be empty.
IS_ROLE_NAME_STRING: The role name field must be a string.
IS_ROLE_ID_EMPTY: The roleId field cannot be empty.
IS_ROLE_ID_NUMBER: The roleId field must be a number.
IS_PERMISSION_ID_EMPTY: The permissionId field cannot be empty.
IS_PERMISSION_ID_NUMBER: The permissionId field must be a number.
IS_CREATED_BY_NUMBER: The createdBy field must be a number.
IS_UPDATED_BY_NUMBER: The updatedBy field must be a number.
IS_USER_ID_EMPTY: The userId field cannot be empty.
IS_USER_ID_NUMBER: The userId field must be a number.
IS_USER_NOT_EMPTY: User array should be not empty
